voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Good morning! Are you Michael?
Good morning! Are you Michael?
Good morning! Are you Michael?
Good morning! Are you Michael?

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: Buenos días, ¿eres Michael

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: I have you going to Fifth Avenue. Is that correct?
I have you going to Fifth Avenue. Is that correct?
I have you going to Fifth Avenue. Is that correct?
I have you going to Fifth Avenue. Is that correct?

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: Te llevo a la Quinta Avenida, ¿es correcto

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Do you have a preferred route, or should I follow the GPS?
Do you have a preferred route, or should I follow the GPS?
Do you have a preferred route, or should I follow the GPS?
Do you have a preferred route, or should I follow the GPS?

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: ¿Tienes una ruta preferida, o sigo el GPS

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: How's your day going so far?
How's your day going so far?
How's your day going so far?
How's your day going so far?

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: ¿Cómo va tu día hasta ahora

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Sorry about the traffic. I'm taking the fastest route available.
Sorry about the traffic. I'm taking the fastest route available.
Sorry about the traffic. I'm taking the fastest route available.
Sorry about the traffic. I'm taking the fastest route available.

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: Disculpa el tráfico. Estoy tomando la ruta más rápida disponible

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: We're here! I'll pull over right in front.
We're here! I'll pull over right in front.
We're here! I'll pull over right in front.
We're here! I'll pull over right in front.

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: ¡Llegamos! Me estacionaré justo enfrente

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Thank you! Have a great day!
Thank you! Have a great day!
Thank you! Have a great day!
Thank you! Have a great day!

voice.name: es-CO-GonzaloNeural
voice.prosody: ¡Gracias! ¡Que tengas un excelente día
